Name Mod Codes
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Game Shark Codes & Dex Drive Saves: Name Mod Codes
By DemonKnight on Saturday, August 25, 2001 - 10:44 pm:

These should work with just about any GS compatable device.

Name Codes. By DemonKnight (I found these my self, and I was proud.
Still am just not as much as I was. I thought I was first to find
these, Dark Pheonix knew about them he just never posted the info.
Well I've never seen any one else post it, so I am!)

These codes must be entered one at a time. Each as a seperate code.
The same goes for the monster name mod code. Going past the 12th
character will result in more letters but in most cases also freeze
the game.

(Trainer Name Mod Codes)
1st Letter: 80098FA0 0Axx
2nd Letter: 80098FA0 0Bxx
3rd Letter: 80098FA0 0Cxx
4th Letter: 80098FA0 0Dxx
5th Letter: 80098FA0 0Exx
6th Letter: 80098FA0 0Fxx
7th Letter: 80098FB0 00xx
8th Letter: 80098FB0 01xx
9th Letter: 80098FB0 02xx
10th Letter: 80098FB0 03xx
11th Letter: 80098FB0 04xx
12th Letter: 80098FB0 05xx

(Monster Name Mode Codes)
1st Letter: 80097B70 08xx
2nd Letter: 80097B70 09xx
3rd Letter: 80097B70 0Axx
4th Letter: 80097B70 0Bxx
5th Letter: 80097B70 0Cxx
6th Letter: 80097B70 0Dxx
7th Letter: 80097B70 0Exx
8th Letter: 80097B70 0Fxx
9th Letter: 80097B80 00xx
10th Letter: 80097B80 01xx
11th Letter: 80097B80 02xx
12th Letter: 80097B80 03xx

(Variable Register Values)
00 = blank space
01 = 0
02 = 1
03 = 2
04 = 3
05 = 4
06 = 5
07 = 6
08 = 7
09 = 8
0A = 9
0B = A
0C = B
0D = C
0E = D
0F = E
10 = F
11 = G
12 = H
13 = I
14 = J
15 = K
16 = L
17 = M
18 = N
19 = O
1A = P
1B = Q
1C = R
1D = S
1E = T
1F = U
20 = V
21 = W
22 = X
23 = Y
24 = Z
25 = a
26 = b
27 = c
28 = d
29 = e
2A = f
2B = g
2C = h
2D = i
2E = j
2F = k
30 = l
31 = m
32 = n
33 = o
34 = p
35 = q
36 = r
37 = s
38 = t
39 = u
3A = v
3B = w
3C = x
3D = y
3E = z
3F = .
40 = a raised dot, kinda like a hyphin
41 = !
42 = ?
43 = -
44 = ,
45 = a large period almost double the
size of what 3F makes.
46 = +
47 = x (multiplication sign)
48 = / (division sign)
49 = - (subtraction sign)
4A = % (percent sign)
4B = = (equals sign)
4C = a weird line that curves at the
top towards the your right, its
kinda raised off the base line a little.
4D = it looks like a J only not as defined,
it really looks alot like 4C turned
upside down and reversed.
4E = O (the O on the PSX contorll type of O)
50 = a square (Like the PSX controlers square)
51 = X (the X button on the PSX controler)
52 = a triangle, its a solid white triangle pointing up
53 = a triangle, its a solid white triangle pointing down
54 = '
55 = "
56 = :
57 = ~
58 = an arrow <-
59 = an arrow ->
5A = (
5B = )
5C = _
5D = a large thick <-
5E = a large arrow pointing up
5F = a thiner arrow pointing up
60 = a thik arrow pointing down
61 = a thin arrow pointing down
